arts.ttl: Frederik Rønnow's penalty heroics secure point for Union Berlin against Freiburg
arts.sum: Union Berlin and Freiburg battled to a 0-0 draw in the Matchday 10 opener, with Frederik Rønnow's penalty save against Vincenzo Grifo proving decisive in a match of few clear-cut chances. Freiburg coach Julian Schuster oversees his team's tactical approach against Union Berlin - Maja Hitij

arts.ttl: Frederik Rønnow on Union Berlin's resurgence and what it's like to work under Bo Svensson
arts.sum: With Union Berlin rediscovering the form that saw them challenge for the European spots for several seasons in a row, bundesliga.com sat down with goalkeeper Frederik Rønnow to discuss Bo Svensson, the Union supporters and much more... bundesliga.com: L ast season didn't go as planned for the club, fans, players or staff.
Week 10 of the Bundesliga promises to serve up plenty of entertainment and Tom McGarry has provided a score prediction for each of the nine games.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. Freiburg preview: Hosts looking to bounce back
arts.sum: Here is our preview of Friday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Freiburg, including our predicted lineups.

arts.ttl: Preview: Union Berlin vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
